name: Titiek Puspa
description: '''Sudarwati''' ({{IPA|id|sudarˈwati|lang}}; 1 November 1937 – 10 April 2025), better known by her stage name '''Titiek Puspa''' ({{IPA|id|tiˈtiək ˈpuspa|lang}}), was an Indonesian singer and songwriter. In 2009, ''[[Rolling Stone Indonesia]]'' selected two of Puspa's songs as some of the best Indonesian songs of all time.
